OrgName.entry: SINGING FOR THE OVER 60S @ ST MARYS

Desc.entry: Singing sessions for anyone aged 60 years and over, everyone welcome, no experience necessary. Alternate sessions each week, with "Sing-a-long with Myrtle" on the 1st and 3rd Mon in the month singing golden oldies, a fun, nostalgic and sociable get together. The 2nd and 4th Mon sessions being natural voice, choir singing with Gill, good for the mind and body and a great way to meet new people. There is a small charge per session which includes refreshments, help with transport may be available, please contact for further details. St Mary's Church is a registered charity and company limited by guarantee no. 4317500.
